trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Novato
There were no other sightings in Novato on or around November 5th 2007
divs: sighting detailswhile walking my dog this morning around the block i was heading south when i noticed what appeared to be two brite stars in the pre-dawn sky. the sky was very clear and these lights at first appeared to be stars but they were in motion coming toward me traveling in a northern direction. they moved in tandem as if at opposite ends of a blimp or something but at one point directly overhead i could view another star between them. they were traveling at a constant speed and took about 2 1\2 minutes to completely disappear into the northern horizon. i kept looking for flashing lights or red lights that would indicate a plane but did not see any. i also listened for engine noise of any sort but heard nothing.
